title: ‘No Use for Hatred’: A Village Seeks to Move On From a U.S. Massacre
content: The hamlet of My Lai is infamous for American war crimes, but now it holds lessons in resilience and how to let go of anger.
summary: The hamlet of My Lai is infamous for American war crimes, but now it holds lessons in resilience and how to let go of anger.

content: It was one horrific day of the war in Ukraine when a missile fell on the Adonis clinic in Kyiv.

summary: The stabbing, in the eastern city of Wuxi, took place days after a man drove a vehicle into a crowd in southern China, killing dozens.

title: Bitter Infighting Divides Russian Opposition

title: South Africa Police Try Siege Tactics on Illegal Mining, Igniting Debate
content: The police have cut off food and water to miners for weeks in a bid to force them out of an abandoned mine. Human rights advocates and community leaders call the tactics inhumane.

title: Princess Yuriko, Oldest Member of Japan’s Imperial Family, Dies at 101
